to assess safety and efficacy of autologous mesenchymal bone marrow stem cell injection in penile cavernosal tissue for erectile dysfunction therapy in diabetic men

Erectile function was assessed by the International Index of Erectile Function and penile Doppler study, before and after 6 months after injection. 4 patients out of 10 achieve hard erection adequate for satisfactory coitus

Mesenchymal bone marrow stem cells were aspirated and injected after preparation in both corpora cavernosa at 3, 9 o'clock position.
